body.raw: We'll begin by looking at the datamodel we intend to create, which is the critical foundation to any data-layer project, and Hasura is no different.

body.raw: An event-driven architecture allows us to create scaleable applications that don't require front-end overhead of polling or checking for updates, and let's us use best-of-breed tools that inform our stack of federated services when they are ready to perform the next job.
body.html: An event-driven architecture allows us to create scaleable applications that don't require front-end overhead of polling or checking for updates, and let's us use best-of-breed tools that inform our stack of federated services when they are ready to perform the next job.

body.raw: We'll be honest, if you're sleeping on low-code, you're missing out. Learn how to abstract substantial overhad from your projects to quickly launch your project. It's ok, you can always code it by hand later, if you want.
